NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
THATCH: The waves do not seem to wash high enough to reach this higher part of the island. I believe we should be able to study the frozen specimens here in peace, my friends!
2 1
THATCH: <color=orange>Tentacled species</color> study
3 2
PLUME: This species was once observed on the ocean's surface during our first expedition to this planet, but we have never again observed this phenomenon.
4
3
COLEUS: These organisms are almost entirely composed of water! They do not appear to have the capability to possess deep wisdom, making it unlikely our presence is the cause of their sudden timidity.
5
2 THATCH: If we transport one of these frozen specimens to a habitat in the <color=orange>Looming City,</color> we may be able to study a live specimen and their behavior in a more controlled environment.
6
5
MELORAE: I support your proposal, Thatch! I would also be curious how this species might interact with the quantum shard in the <color=orange>Looming City..</color>
7
6
MELORAE: ..Wait. What is happening? Why has the sky gone dark? What is..
